title: me letting out all the hatred i have for Vayne.
body:
FUCJKJ THIS CHAMPION. I SHIT ON THE BITCH IN LANE TO THE POINT WHERE SHE GOES 0/11 BUT THEN SHE GETS LITERALLY 2 KILLS AND SHES BACK IN THE GAME AGAIN??????????????? FUCK HER GAY ASS MOBILITY. I WOULDNT HAVE A PROBLEM WITH HER ROLLING AROUND THE MAP EVERY 2 SECS IF RITO DIDNT REMOVE THE ABILITY TO SEE HER WITH CONTROL WARDS DURING HER ULT ALSO ON THE TOPIC OF HER ULT WHY THE HELL DOES SHE GET 50 AND 70 AD FOR 10AND 12 SEECONDS???? IF SHE WAS SINGLE TARGET FOCUSSED OPPOSED TO TWITCH I WOULDNT GIVE A FUCK BUT HER STUPID MOBILITY AND BULLSHIT INVISIBILITY YOU CANT DO ANYTHING ABOUT TAKES AWAY FROM HER BEING "SINGLE TARGET" FOCUSSED. OH DONT FORGET HER E. AS IF HER ENDLESS MOBILITY AND INVISIBILTY WASNT ENOUGH SELF PEEL. ALSO COULD YOU GUYS STOP SAYING SHE HAS SHORT RANGE? 550 AINT SHORT, ESPECIALLY WITH HER STUPID MOBILITY. INFACT HERES A LIST OF ADCs WHO ALSO HAVE 550 AA RANGE TWITCH, EZ, DRAVEN, JHIN, KALISTA, MF AND CORKI. AND HEZRES ADCs WHO HAVE LESS THAN 550 XAYAH, SIVIR, LUCIAN AND JINX. 

OVERALL THE POINT OF THIS POST IS FUCK VAYNE WHOEVER MADE HER SHOULD HAVE PAINFUL STUFF DONE TO THEIR GENITALS
